data.text: Hah... Hah...
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: 󠁿Hah... Hah...

data.text:
Ah, crap. I can't believe it's already dark. 
I think I can still do another lap, though.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
󠁿Ah, crap. I can't believe it's already dark. 
󠁿I think I can still do another lap, though.

data.text:
And Tray-chan... 
They must be heading home around now.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
󠁿And Tray-chan... 
󠁿They must be heading home around now.

data.text: "It would be boring."
data.processed: 󠁿"It would be boring."

data.text: (Hehe... I can't believe they feel that way too.)
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: 󠁿(Hehe... I can't believe they feel that way too.)

data.text:
Your running looks pretty much good to go. 
We should focus on consistency and a training regimen next!
data.name: Experienced Trainer A
data.processed:
󠁿Your running looks pretty much good to go. 
󠁿We should focus on consistency and a training regimen next!

data.text:
No, I think we should keep going the way we've been 
and slowly bring out your highest potential. With that...
data.name: Veteran Trainer A
data.processed:
󠁿No, I think we should keep going the way we've been 
󠁿and slowly bring out your highest potential. With that...

data.text: You can win!
data.name: Both
data.processed: 󠁿You can win!

data.text:
(I'm sorry, but... 
Winning or losing isn't what's on my mind...)
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
󠁿(I'm sorry, but... 
󠁿Winning or losing isn't what's on my mind...)

data.text:
(And so... 
Even though several trainers came to scout me, 
none of them quite clicked with me.)
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
󠁿(And so... 
󠁿Even though several trainers came to scout me, 
󠁿none of them quite clicked with me.)

data.text:
Ever since I was little, incredible things that I hadn't 
heard or seen before filled me with excitement. 
They gave me a sense of fulfilment.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
󠁿Ever since I was little, incredible things that I hadn't 
󠁿heard or seen before filled me with excitement. 
󠁿They gave me a sense of fulfilment.

data.text:
Dad, what's the "Deep Sea"? 
Is it deeper than the lower floors of a mall?
data.name: Young Tran
data.processed:
󠁿Dad, what's the "Deep Sea"? 
󠁿Is it deeper than the lower floors of a mall?

data.text:
Indeed. See those pictures? 
Those are fish that only live in the deep sea.
data.name: Tran's Father
data.processed:
󠁿Indeed. See those pictures? 
󠁿Those are fish that only live in the deep sea.

data.text:
I've never seen those kinds of fish before! 
Wow, they are awesome! I want to see a real one!
data.name: Young Tran
data.processed:
󠁿I've never seen those kinds of fish before! 
󠁿Wow, they are awesome! I want to see a real one!

data.text: Mom, what is there far, far away?
data.name: Young Tran
data.processed: 󠁿Mom, what is there far, far away?

data.text:
Far, far away is the big wide sea. 
Come, climb on my shoulders.
data.name: Trans' Mother
data.processed:
󠁿Far, far away is the big wide sea. 
󠁿Come, climb on my shoulders.

data.text:
Wow! The sea! 
Mom, what's there behind the sea?
data.name: Young Tran
data.processed:
󠁿Wow! The sea! 
󠁿Mom, what's there behind the sea?

data.text: Can I go there? If I run far enough?
data.name: Young Tran
data.processed: 󠁿Can I go there? If I run far enough?

data.text:
Unknown places far beyond... Just thinking about it 
got me excited. The thrill of being able to go there one day.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
󠁿Unknown places far beyond... Just thinking about it 
󠁿got me excited. The thrill of being able to go there one day.

data.text:
Just imagining it isn't enough. 
I want to experience that world for myself, 
with my own eyes and legs.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
󠁿Just imagining it isn't enough. 
󠁿I want to experience that world for myself, 
󠁿with my own eyes and legs.

data.text:
I looked for more thrill and excitement. 
And in the end, I landed on...
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
󠁿I looked for more thrill and excitement. 
󠁿And in the end, I landed on...

data.text: Racing.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: 󠁿Racing.

data.text: The state of the track, the rivalries, the element of luck that makes things unpredictable and info alone not enough... The end result is always unknown!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: 󠁿The state of the track, the rivalries, the element of luck 󠁿that makes things unpredictable and info alone not enough... 󠁿The end result is always unknown!

data.text:
I joined Tracen Academy to seek those things I long for. 
And I met others who are in the same boat.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
󠁿I joined Tracen Academy to seek those things I long for. 
󠁿And I met others who are in the same boat.

data.text:
Of course, encounters alone aren't enough. 
Not by a long shot. The only way to feel the thrill I seek... 
Is by racing my heart out!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
󠁿Of course, encounters alone aren't enough. 
󠁿Not by a long shot. The only way to feel the thrill I seek... 
󠁿Is by racing my heart out!

data.text:
(Exceeding all imagination with bated breath. 
Clashing with everything I've got, in a scene so dazzling...)
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
󠁿(Exceeding all imagination with bated breath. 
󠁿Clashing with everything I've got, in a scene so dazzling...)

data.text:
(Not being sure who's going to win. 
The thrill of a race where I put everything on the line...!)
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
󠁿(Not being sure who's going to win. 
󠁿The thrill of a race where I put everything on the line...!)

data.text: Hah...
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: 󠁿Hah...

data.text:
(—But I won't be able to taste that thrill 
the way I am now.)
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
󠁿(—But I won't be able to taste that thrill 
󠁿the way I am now.)

data.text:
(I need a trainer first. Someone who also 
thinks beyond simply winning or losing...)
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
󠁿(I need a trainer first. Someone who also 
󠁿thinks beyond simply winning or losing...)

data.text:
(I didn't think I'd find someone like that. 
In fact, I was about to give up and accept 
that it would never happen...)
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
󠁿(I didn't think I'd find someone like that. 
󠁿In fact, I was about to give up and accept 
󠁿that it would never happen...)

data.text:
(I was about to just accept anyone who'd just 
give me freedom to let me run as I'd like...)
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
󠁿(I was about to just accept anyone who'd just 
󠁿give me freedom to let me run as I'd like...)

data.text:
(When I think about Tray-chan becoming my trainer... 
I feel like they'd actually fit me well.)
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
󠁿(When I think about Tray-chan becoming my trainer... 
󠁿I feel like they'd actually fit me well.)

data.text: (What if I did something crazy and approached them instead...? Would we be able to work together... Towards the land of the unknown?)
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: 󠁿(What if I did something crazy and approached them 󠁿instead...? Would we be able to work together... 󠁿Towards the land of the unknown?)

data.text:
(Surely that's... 
Out of the question, eh?)
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
󠁿(Surely that's... 
󠁿Out of the question, eh?)

data.text:
(Oh, what am I even doing. 
I need to focus on my running.)
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
󠁿(Oh, what am I even doing. 
󠁿I need to focus on my running.)

data.text: Eh...! Haaaaa!!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: 󠁿Eh...! Haaaaa!!

data.text: That's what the thrill of running must be.
data.processed: 󠁿That's what the thrill of running must be.

data.text:
Her running is on par with those who've already debuted. 
If not better...
data.processed:
󠁿Her running is on par with those who've already debuted. 
󠁿If not better...

data.text:
Not to say she couldn't improve. 
But for someone without a trainer... Damn.
data.processed:
󠁿Not to say she couldn't improve. 
󠁿But for someone without a trainer... Damn.

data.text:
Seeing her run drew me in. She's not running towards any 
goal, but rather to something even further than that.
data.processed:
󠁿Seeing her run drew me in. She's not running towards any 
󠁿goal, but rather to something even further than that.

data.text:
What would it take to guide her... 
Finding her weaknesses and helping her overcome them? 
No, that's just not going to cut it.
data.processed:
󠁿What would it take to guide her... 
󠁿Finding her weaknesses and helping her overcome them? 
󠁿No, that's just not going to cut it.

data.text:
She's already able to fascinate me with her running. 
There must be some latent power inside her...
data.processed:
󠁿She's already able to fascinate me with her running. 
󠁿There must be some latent power inside her...

data.text:
She is the answer. 
Right in front of me... Is the umamusume I sought for. 
She was there all along.
data.processed:
󠁿She is the answer. 
󠁿Right in front of me... Is the umamusume I sought for. 
󠁿She was there all along.
